languages.text: Конец мучениям положил{mf||а} сам{mf||а} элантах — не желая видеть, как угасает Ирлиэт в чужом для себя мире, он{mf||а} убедил{mf||а} эльдарку покинуть Простор. Наверное, во вселенной есть вещи, которым просто не дано существовать, и счастливый союз мон-кай и эльдарской воительницы — одна из них.

The elantach {mf|him|her}self put an end to this torment. Not willing to see Yrliet wither away in an alien world, {mf|he|she} persuaded the Aeldari to leave the Expanse. It seems that some things are just not meant to be, and a happy union between a mon-keigh and an Aeldari warrior is one of them.
languages.original_text: Конец мучениям положил{mf||а} сам{mf||а} элантах — не желая видеть, как угасает Ирлиэт в чужом для себя мире, он{mf||а} убедил{mf||а} эльдарку покинуть Простор. Наверное, во вселенной есть вещи, которым просто не дано существовать, и счастливый союз мон-кай и эльдарской воительницы — одна из них.

traits.locale_text: Elantach {mf|him|her}self put an end to this torment. Not willing to see, ow Yrliet withers in a world alien to her, {mf|he|she} persuaded the Aeldari to leave the Expanse. It seems that some things are just not meant to be. A happy union of mon-keigh and Aeldari warrior is one of them.

Elantach {mf|him|her}self put an end to this torment. Not willing to see, ow Yrliet withers in a world alien to her, {mf|he|she} persuaded the Aeldari to leave the Expanse. It seems that some things are just not meant to be. A happy union of mon-keigh and Aeldari warrior is one of them.

The elantach {mf|him|her}self put an end to this torment. Not willing to see Yrliet wither away in an alien world, {mf|he|she} persuaded the Aeldari to leave the Expanse. It seems that some things are just not meant to be — the happy union of a mon-keigh and Aeldari warrior among them.

The elantach {mf|him|her}self put an end to this torment. Not willing to see Yrliet wither away in an alien world, {mf|he|she} persuaded the Aeldari to leave the Expanse. It seems that some things are just not meant to be — the happy union of a mon-keigh and Aeldari warrior among them.

The elantach {mf|him|her}self put an end to this torment. Not willing to see Yrliet wither away in an alien world, {mf|he|she} persuaded the Aeldari to leave the Expanse. It seems that some things are just not meant to be, and a happy union between a mon-keigh and an Aeldari warrior is one of them.

The elantach {mf|him|her}self put an end to this torment. Not willing to see Yrliet wither away in an alien world, {mf|he|she} persuaded the Aeldari to leave the Expanse. It seems that some things are just not meant to be, and a happy union between a mon-keigh and an Aeldari warrior is one of them.

languages.text: 外界人主动结束了这样的折磨，{mf|他|她}不愿看到伊莉耶特在陌生的世界中里枯萎，于是说服了这位艾达灵族离开科罗努斯扩区。看起来，有些事情是注定无法发生的，例如猴子注定无法与艾达灵族的战士幸福地结合在一起。
languages.original_text: The elantach {mf|him|her}self put an end to this torment. Not willing to see Yrliet wither away in an alien world, {mf|he|she} persuaded the Aeldari to leave the Expanse. It seems that some things are just not meant to be, and a happy union between a mon-keigh and an Aeldari warrior is one of them.

traits.locale_text: 外界人主动结束了这样的折磨，{mf|他|她}不愿看到伊莉耶特在陌生的世界中里枯萎，于是说服了这位艾达灵族离开科罗努斯扩区。看起来，有些事情是注定无法发生的，例如猴子注定无法与艾达灵族的战士幸福地结合在一起。

languages.text: Der Elantach selbst setzte diesem Leiden ein Ende. {mf|Er|Sie} war nicht bereit, Yrliet auf einer fremden Welt dahinsiechen zu sehen, und überredete die Aeldari, die Ausdehnung zu verlassen. Manche Dinge sind offenbar einfach nicht vorherbestimmt. Und eine glückliche Verbindung zwischen einem Chem-Pan-Sey und einer Aeldari-Kriegerin gehört dazu.
languages.original_text: The elantach {mf|him|her}self put an end to this torment. Not willing to see Yrliet wither away in an alien world, {mf|he|she} persuaded the Aeldari to leave the Expanse. It seems that some things are just not meant to be, and a happy union between a mon-keigh and an Aeldari warrior is one of them.

traits.locale_text: Der Elantach selbst setzte diesem Leiden ein Ende. {mf|Er|Sie} war nicht bereit, Yrliet auf einer fremden Welt dahinsiechen zu sehen, und überredete die Aeldari, die Ausdehnung zu verlassen. Manche Dinge sind offenbar einfach nicht vorherbestimmt. Und die glückliche Verbindung zwischen einem Chem-Pan-Sey und einer Aeldari-Kriegerin gehört dazu.

languages.text: L'elantach {mf|lui|elle}-même mis fin à ce tourment. Ne voulant pas voir Yrliet dépérir dans un monde qui n'était pas le sien, {mf|il|elle} persuada les Aeldaris de quitter les Étendues. Il semble que certaines choses soient tout simplement impossibles, comme l'union d'{mf|un|une} mon-keigh et d'une guerrière aeldari.
languages.original_text: The elantach {mf|him|her}self put an end to this torment. Not willing to see Yrliet wither away in an alien world, {mf|he|she} persuaded the Aeldari to leave the Expanse. It seems that some things are just not meant to be, and a happy union between a mon-keigh and an Aeldari warrior is one of them.

traits.locale_text: L'elantach {mf|lui|elle}-même mis fin à ce tourment. Ne voulant pas voir Yrliet dépérir dans un monde qui n’était pas le sien, {mf|il|elle} persuada les Aeldaris de quitter les Étendues. Il semble que certaines choses soient tout simplement impossibles, comme l'union d’{mf|un|une} mon-keigh et d'une guerrière aeldari.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} elantach puso fin a este tormento personalmente. Incapaz de ver a Yrliet marchitarse en un mundo desconocido, convenció a la Aeldari de que abandonara la Extensión. Parece que algunas cosas, como la feliz unión de un{mf||a} mon-keigh y una guerrera Aeldari, son imposibles.
languages.original_text: The elantach {mf|him|her}self put an end to this torment. Not willing to see Yrliet wither away in an alien world, {mf|he|she} persuaded the Aeldari to leave the Expanse. It seems that some things are just not meant to be, and a happy union between a mon-keigh and an Aeldari warrior is one of them.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} elantach puso fin a este tormento personalmente. Incapaz de ver a Yrliet marchitarse en un mundo desconocido, convenció a la Aeldari de que abandonara la Extensión. Parece que algunas cosas, como la feliz unión de un{mf||a} mon-keigh y una guerrera Aeldari, son imposibles.

languages.text: エランタは、その苦悩に終止符を打った。異世界で枯れていくユリエットを見過ごすわけにはいかないと、アエルダリにエクスパンスを去るよう説得した。どうやら、物事にはなるべくしてならないというものもあるようだ。モン＝ケイとアエルダリの戦士の幸せな結びつきもそのひとつである。
languages.original_text: The elantach {mf|him|her}self put an end to this torment. Not willing to see Yrliet wither away in an alien world, {mf|he|she} persuaded the Aeldari to leave the Expanse. It seems that some things are just not meant to be, and a happy union between a mon-keigh and an Aeldari warrior is one of them.

traits.locale_text: エランタは、その苦悩に終止符を打った。異世界で枯れていくユリエットを見過ごすわけにはいかないと、アエルダリにエクスパンスを去るよう説得した。どうやら、物事にはなるべくしてならないというものもあるようだ。モン＝ケイとアエルダリの戦士の幸せな結びつきもそのひとつである。

languages.text: Bu ızdıraba son veren, elantach'ın kendisi oldu. Yrliet'in yabancı bir dünyada solup gitmesini istemediği için Aeldari'yi Enginlik'i terk etmeye ikna etti. Bazı şeylerin bir türlü olmaz. Bir mon-keigh ile savaşçı bir Aeldari arasında mutlu bir birlikteliğin kurulamayacağı da böylece ispatlanmış oldu.
languages.original_text: The elantach {mf|him|her}self put an end to this torment. Not willing to see Yrliet wither away in an alien world, {mf|he|she} persuaded the Aeldari to leave the Expanse. It seems that some things are just not meant to be, and a happy union between a mon-keigh and an Aeldari warrior is one of them.

traits.locale_text: Bu ızdıraba elantach'ın kendisi bir son verdi. Yrliet'in yabancı bir dünyada solup gitmesini istemediği için Aeldari'yi Enginlik'i terk etmesi konusunda ikna etti. Bazı şeylerin kaderinde gerçekleşmemek vardır derler ve bir mon-keigh ve bir Aeldari savaşçı arasındaki mutlu birlikteliğin de onlardan biri olduğu ispatlanmış oldu.
